channel.title: If i use melee it kicks all my players
channel.description:
i dont get it..on any type of acc memeber,mod,admin maxed,newb. it just kicked with like 20 weps that ive tryed..but range and mage work fine
it kicks all my players plz tell me what the problem is and btw it kicks if i melee attk monsters and people

item.title: If i use melee it kicks all my players

item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

dont click fast u have a code that disconects u if u kick fast
